data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Alloteratura Hebard, 1922 (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae: Meconematini) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xin, Yarui, Shi, Fuming (2019): Three new species of the genus Alloteratura Hebard, 1922 (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae: Meconematini) from China. Zootaxa 4651 (2): 289-296, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4651.2.5
